climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 6.7", 1080 x 2400 pixels, Dynamic AMOLED 2X, 120Hz, HDR10+, 1300nits, 4800mAh Battery
128GB ROM, 8GB RAM, No SD Card Slot, Qualcomm SM8350 Snapdragon 888 5G (5 nm), Octa-Core, Adreno 660.

body.description: Embark on a journey of innovation with the Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G SM-G996U – a symphony of cutting-edge technology and style. Immerse yourself in a visual masterpiece on its expansive display, where vibrant details burst forth in every frame. Capture life's magic with precision through the advanced camera system, turning ordinary moments into extraordinary memories. Fueled by a powerful processor, this device ensures a seamless and responsive performance, tailored to your dynamic lifestyle. With a robust battery, it keeps you connected throughout your day, while intuitive features enhance your daily tasks. Elevate your experience within the Samsung ecosystem, where a sleek and resilient companion awaits – not just a phone, but a testament to Samsung's commitment to redefine your mobile journey. Unleash the extraordinary with the Samsung Galaxy S21+ 5G SM-G996U, where style, innovation, and performance converge in a captivating blend. Our carefully inspected and tested Manufacturer refurbished products assure full functionality, having undergone a comprehensive examination. While they may exhibit signs of light to moderate usage, each unit is certified as functional by Phonecheck, an industry-certified, leading stringent quality control and diagnostics examination. Moreover, our commitment to quality extends to a thorough cleaning process. Please note that each shipment may arrive in a brown or white generic box, accompanied by relevant charging accessories (please be aware that headphones are not included), which may also be generic. Our top priority throughout this refurbishment process is your reliable performance and quality assurance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works extremely well, like new
reviews.reviewText: Bought it expecting a good condition at most, received it in an almost-pristine condition. I am sincerely shocked by how good of a deal this was. Sure, one or two very small dents on the sides, but NO CRACKS and NO SCRATCHES AT ALL! Please, if you are considering this phone, just buy it already. It is an absolute monster of a deal and you will not be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great refurbished phone.
reviews.reviewText: So far I've been testing my Samsung galaxy 21+ for several months now and I say it's an amazing refurbished phone.At first, we bought it for my husband one month earlier than mine and his phone works amazingly the same as mine.There were some little scratches at the back, but we covered them with a phone case. The screen itself was as new, battery works fine.So far our phones work great and I recommend buying it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got the phone and performance wise it's okay. The battery life doesn't last as long as I would have hoped and I don't use it often or to stream stuff or play games etc. The condition was not as advertised..poor condition...scratches all over the screen visible while the phone off and on and all over the body. Poor experience, extremely disappointed with the seller and the product. If I could I would give no stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Like new. Almost.
reviews.reviewText: The phone itself is like new. Works like new.The only quibble is it was delivered loose in the box. So it's rattling around with the two cheap accessories it came with. Kind of strange a $300 item would be delivered like that. I'm all for saving packaging, but this seems excessive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This has been a great phone.
reviews.reviewText: I think these are an excellent value if your in the market for a renewed phone. I got this phone for my partner because he wanted a better gaming experience and the phone has exeeded his expectation. He likes the large flat screen and 120 hertz diisplay. The camaras are great all around as well and have very good low light capability much better then my Samsung Galaxy Note 20 5G which struggles in low lght conditions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impecable like new
reviews.reviewText: Came in excellent condition works perfectly !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything was smooth!
reviews.reviewText: So i bought the phone cause i have had my note 9+ for years, and it's been through a lot of fights with floors and concrete. Let's just put it that way, so from reading all the reviews i was really really worried and didn't even buy a case yet. Going hey if it doesn't work, i didn't waste money on a good case and i send it back.Nothing was wrong with the case, Though i did realize that the finger scanner was having issues. Why? cause there was a screen protector on it, assumingly to make sure it didn't break on the way here. Then took it off and boom was working fine, i kinda wish i saw a note about that but i didn't, or at least i didn't see it. Getting my phone company to let me use the phone, Quick.Testing all features i knew about, even faster.Smallest thing about the phone: Buttons were a little dinted but not badlyI would suggest getting this phone, 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars good phone but the charge plug was compromised
reviews.reviewText: I like the phone and decent price, but the charge cord was weird requiring hard pressure to connect and only certain cords of the same type would work, sometimes it got very hot. I now charge only with wireless.I beleive its a repair phone and in ALL these phones the charge plug is the weak link and fails leaving the phone useless. We need some way to repair/replace this simple hardware and not require new phones when a $2 part fails.
